name: backv2
description: Root project containing DevDocs and repository

scripts.dev:backend: cd repo && python -m pip install flask flask-cors pymongo python-dotenv && python app.py
scripts.test:with-server: start-server-and-test dev:all http://localhost:3004 "cd DevDocs && npx playwright test"
scripts.predev:backend: python -m pip install flask flask-cors pymongo python-dotenv
